title: Idea for a change to Warwick
body:
Hey there everyone, I have a sort of concept Riot could do to improve Warwick, or at least balance him a bit:
Change his E so instead of the constant detecting champs at low hp and gaining move speed towards him, change it so:
Warwick detects champs who have taken 
1>35% damage within 10 seconds 
2>30% damage within 10 seconds 
3>20% damage within 10 seconds 
4>15% damage within 10 seconds 
5>10% damage within 10 seconds and then when he detects them
he can activate his E so he gains move speed towards them for 
1> 5 seconds 
2> 7 seconds 
3> 8 seconds
4> 9 seconds 
5> 10 seconds
Just an idea I have had in the back of my head for a while.

replies.body: From what I gather, his E is going to fundamentally change because they are likely going to give him a pre-6 gap closer.  I am actually kind of excited to see what they do with it.  The only cool thing about Warwick right now his is Lore.
I don't think an active should be added to his current E because that would remove the option to toggle it off which can be crucial in pulling off ganks.
and this could go towards that
